DOC.brief_title: Exercises Associated Not With Manual Therapy Shoulder Impingement
DOC.criteria: history nontraumatic onset shoulder pain ; painful arc active elevation arm ; one positive shoulder impingement test ( Neer , Hawkins Jobe ) , pain passive resist external rotation arm 90° abduction ; pain palpation rotator cuff tendon ; subject need also able reach 150° arm elevation evaluate visual observation . limitation glenohumeral internal external rotation indicative adhesive capsulitis ; body mass index > 28kg/m2 amount subcutaneous tissue compromise quality signal increase soft tissue artifact ; numbness tingle upper limb reproduce cervical compression test ; history clavicle , scapula humerus fracture ; history rotator cuff surgery ; systemic illness ; positive sulcus apprehension test indicative instability ; positive drop arm test indicative full thickness tear ; corticosteroid injection within 3 month prior intervention , physiotherapy within 6 month prior intervention ; depressive symptom evaluate Beck Depression Inventory score ( > 9 point ) due influence myofascial pain ; allergy tape .
